alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 6:37PM CST until February 18 at 2:25PM CST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee...Georgia... Lookout Creek near New England affecting Dade and Hamilton Counties. For the Lookout Creek...including New England...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lookout Creek near New England. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Minor flooding continues along Sells Lane in Trenton...Mason Road near Rising Fawn...and Creek Road near New England. All these roads will be closed. Also minor flooding expands much further downstream as the creek crosses the Tennessee border into the Tiftonia area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM EST Friday was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 5.2 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.3 feet on 02/26/1992. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
